channel.title: (REQ) Looking for some unpacker/packer tools
channel.description:
Most tools that have been released have dead links. I'm looking to duplicate some existing items and npc's, I'm in need for certain custom configs that i cant find on config dumps. And ofcourse when i add in these items/npc's i want to pack them back into the cache.
Would really appreaciate it, if someone has some old tools/methods for this.

Most tools that have been released have dead links.
